arguments.template:
<farris-dialog #dialog [buttons]="configDialogButtonRef" [width]="699" [height]="544" [title]="title">
    <multi-select #searchMulti [dataSource]="visibleFields" [idField]="'id'" [textField]="'fieldName'" [displayType]="'List'" [(selectedId)]="selectedIds" [showCheckbox]="true">
        <ng-template farrisTemplate="text" let-data>
            {{ data['fieldName'] }}
        </ng-template>
    </multi-select>
</farris-dialog>
<ng-template #configDialogButtonRef>
    <button class="btn btn-primary" (click)="confirm()">{{'queryCondition.configDialog.confirm' | locale}}</button>
    <button class="btn btn-secondary" (click)="cancel()">{{'queryCondition.configDialog.cancel' | locale}}</button>
</ng-template>
请输入有效格式
